original_text: And there was again war with the Philistines, and Elhanan the son of Jair struck down Lahmi the brother of Goliath the Gittite, the shaft of whose spear was like a weaver's beam.
korean_text: 다시 블레셋 사람들과 전쟁할 때에 야일의 아들 엘하난이 가드 사람 골리앗의 아우 라흐미를 죽였는데 이 사람의 창자루는 베틀채 같았더라

sentences.original_text: And there was again war with the Philistines
and Elhanan the son of Jair struck down Lahmi
the brother of Goliath the Gittite
the shaft of whose spear was like a weaver's beam
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 창 자루는 베 짜는 사람의 북과 같았다
